description: Common contract risk patterns for automated detection

patterns.name: Unlimited Liability / 无限责任
patterns.description: No cap on liability or indemnification obligations
patterns.recommendation: Add liability cap (e.g., 12 months of fees or contract value)

patterns.name: Broad IP Assignment / 宽泛知识产权转让
patterns.description: Assigns all intellectual property including pre-existing IP
patterns.recommendation: Exclude pre-existing IP; define scope of assignment clearly

patterns.name: Unilateral Termination / 单方解约权
patterns.description: One party can terminate without cause or with very short notice
patterns.recommendation: Require mutual termination rights or reasonable notice period

patterns.name: Auto-Renewal Trap / 自动续约陷阱
patterns.description: Contract auto-renews with difficult opt-out process
patterns.recommendation: Add clear opt-out mechanism with reasonable notice period

patterns.name: One-Sided Indemnification / 单向赔偿
patterns.description: Only one party bears indemnification obligations
patterns.recommendation: Negotiate mutual indemnification or limit scope

patterns.name: Excessive Penalty / 过高违约金
patterns.description: Penalty clause that exceeds reasonable damages
patterns.recommendation: Ensure penalty is proportionate to actual potential damages

patterns.name: Broad Non-Compete / 宽泛竞业限制
patterns.description: Non-compete clause with excessive scope, duration, or geography
patterns.recommendation: Limit scope, duration (2 years max), and geographic area

patterns.name: Perpetual Confidentiality / 永久保密
patterns.recommendation: Set reasonable time limit (3-5 years typical)

patterns.name: Unfavorable Jurisdiction / 不利管辖
patterns.description: Dispute resolution in unfavorable or distant jurisdiction
patterns.recommendation: Negotiate neutral venue or your local jurisdiction

patterns.name: Broad Rights Waiver / 宽泛权利放弃
patterns.description: Waiver of statutory or fundamental rights
patterns.recommendation: Remove or limit scope of waiver

patterns.name: Uncontrolled Scope Changes / 范围变更无控制
patterns.description: No process for managing scope or specification changes
patterns.recommendation: Add change management process with pricing mechanism

patterns.name: Unfavorable Payment Terms / 不利付款条款
patterns.description: Long payment cycles or payment contingent on subjective criteria
patterns.recommendation: Negotiate shorter payment cycles and objective acceptance criteria

patterns.name: Missing Audit Rights / 缺少审计权
patterns.description: No right to audit supplier compliance or financials

patterns.name: Missing Force Majeure / 缺少不可抗力条款
Missing Data Protection / 缺少数据保护条款
patterns.description: No provisions for personal data handling (GDPR, PIPL compliance)
patterns.recommendation: Add data protection clause compliant with applicable laws
